rule.name: AvoidUnnecessaryTestClassesModifier
rule.message: Avoid public, protected or private modifier for test classes
rule.description: Avoid public, protected or private modifier for test classes. There is no benefit.

property.name: xpath
property.value: //TypeDeclaration/ClassOrInterfaceDeclaration[@Public = true() or @Private = true() or @Protected = true()] [.//Annotation[@AnnotationName = "Test" or @AnnotationName = "ParameterizedTest"]]
